titleInfo.title: City car with bumper stickers for the Clean Up, Paint Up, Fix Up campaign, City Beautiful Scrapbooks, 1956, Vol. 1 p.64

mods.identifier: City Beautiful Vol 1 p64 City Beautiful Car 1956 001

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Photograph of a city car with bumper stickers for the 1956 Clean Up, Paint Up, Fix Up campaign, taken by the City Beautiful Commission of Nashville, Tennessee, 1956. The City Beautiful Commission was established by the Mayor and City Council in June of 1953, for the purpose of improving the sanitation, cleanliness, and overall appearance of the City of Nashville. The Commission later became a division of Metro Parks in 1975, and then a part of the Metro Public Works division in 2005. Forms part of the City Beautiful Commission Scrapbook Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
